official_title: Development and Implementation of Electronic Decision Aids for Genetic Testing in Inherited Cancer Syndromes
inclusion_criteria:
* Adults (18 years of age or older)
* Diagnosed with malignant ovarian tumor or malignant pancreatic adenocarcinoma
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Children (<18 years of age)
* Unable to complete surveys
* Previous germline genetic testing
